class.name: open_karto/G2OSolver
class.description: Plugin for karto slam that uses G2O solver.

class.name: open_karto/VertigoMaxMixSolver
class.description: Plugin for karto slam that uses the Max-mixtures solver from the vertigo/g2o library.

class.name: open_karto/VertigoSwitchableSolver
class.description: Plugin for karto slam that uses the switchable solver from the vertigo/g2o library.
